_header: Son one thing of charity I thee rede
_description: On the way in which Mass is to be sung — ten lines

BLHar3810.First Lines: Son on thyng of charite I the redeDo it as well for the quyk as for the dede…
BLHar3810.Last Lines: …fful long me thynkith I suffred woGod lett neuer sawle sofre so
BLHar3810.Editions:
Jordan,  Richard. 
             “Das ‘Trentalle Gregorii’ in der Handschrift Harley
                3810.” 
             Englische Studien
         40 (1909): 351-71: 366.
